lyrics.text:
Hili ‘a e ma’u ke ‘osi,
Si’i ngaahi me’a o ‘eni,
Fai hono me’a lelei,
Kai hono me’a lelei,
Fēfē?
Toe ‘a e fu’u ngangau;
Toe ‘a e ongosia;
Ko e hingoa pē,
Mo e mamahi’ia.

Hili ‘a e fu’u ngangau,
Hili ‘a e ongosia;
Ko e hingoa ni,
Mo e mamahi’ia,
Fēfē?
Ko e tō atu pē;
Nofo he potu noa:
‘Unu he kāinga,
‘Unu he meʻa kotoa.

Hili ‘a e nofo noa
‘I he fa’itoka ē;
‘Unu he kāinga,
He meʻa kotoa pē,
Fēfē?
He fakamaau pē;
Tu’atamaki pē,
He mala’ia pē,
Heli ma’u ai pē.
